usage.h1: text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-tight text-slate-900
usage.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide text-slate-500 uppercase

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;500;700;800&display=swap');

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant. High contrast. Dealer UI uses 'Sunny Yellow' (#FACC15) for primary actions to mimic Bumble's energy. Brand Admin uses 'Vibrant Indigo' (#4F46E5) for professional authority.

grids.gallery: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-8

buttons.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

variants.dealer_action: bg-[#FACC15] text-slate-900 hover:bg-[#EAB308] font-bold shadow-xl shadow-yellow-400/20 h-12 px-8 text-base

inputs.base: flex h-11 w-full rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

dealer_portal.vibe: Bumble-like simplicity. Swipeable, big touch targets, minimal text.
dealer_portal.creative_card: Full width or large card. Image takes 80% of space. 'Personalize' button is massive.
dealer_portal.slip_selector: Horizontal scroll of circular or square templates at bottom of screen.

brand_admin.vibe: Canva-like workspace. Clean, organized, drag-and-drop feel.
brand_admin.dashboard: Bento grid of analytics (Top Performing Dealers, Recent Downloads).
brand_admin.upload_zone: Large dashed area with 'Drop files here' illustration.

people.description: Shop owner in front of store

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are encouraged.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a B2B app with a B2C soul. The Dealer Portal must feel like a consumer app (Bumble/Instagram) - extremely simple, visual, and touch-friendly. The Brand Admin is a professional workspace (Canva/Linear) - clean, efficient, and powerful. Use the provided image URLs for all mock data. Implement the 'Slip' feature as a visual overlay on the creative image.
